errors.moveAppFailed: Please, move the Creator Hub application to the Applications folder and open the Creator Hub application from it

sign_in.title: Sign In to publish your scenes

feedback.title: Shape the future of Creator Hub

no_scenes.title: Create your first scene
no_scenes.description: Unleash your creativity. Start building scenes for your LANDs and Worlds and share with the community. Learn more about creating Scenes.

delete_project.title: Are you sure you want to delete {title} from 'My Scenes'?
delete_project.files_checkbox: Also delete this scene's files from my computer
delete_project.files_warning: Deleting scene files from your computer is permanent, you won't be able to access this scene again.

publish_project.title: Publish "{title}"
publish_project.select: Where would you like to deploy your scene to?

worlds.title: Worlds
worlds.description: Your own virtual space, separate from Genesis City. Claim yours when you get a NAME.

select_world.title: Publish to World
select_world.description: Select the Decentraland NAME or ENS Domain that will define the URL
select_world.world_has_content: The existing content in {world} World will be replaced with the new content you're about to publish.
select_world.confirm_world_replace_content: I understand that this action is irreversible

empty_names.title: You don't have any available World
empty_names.description:
Get a free world when you own a NAME.

Each NAME will give you access to one World. You can have as many as you want.

land.title: My Land
land.description: The parcels that make up Decentraland's Genesis City map. Buy or rent your own in the Marketplace.

select_parcel.select_parcel: Select the LANDs that will host your Scene

warning.message:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY:
  • After deployment, your scene will undergo processing before becoming available.
  • This process may take 15 minutes on average.
  • During this time, your scene will appear empty until it has been updated on the client.

deploying.info: This process may take 15 minutes on average. During this time, your scene may appear empty until it has been updated in the client.

errors.code_error:
Your scene code contains one or more errors.
Please fix them and try again.
errors.fetch_status:
Failed to fetch deployment information.
Please, try again.
errors.catalyst:
Deployment to the Catalyst nodes failed.
Please retry or check your internet connection.
errors.max_retries:
Retry limit exceeded.
Please, try again later.
errors.not_found:
Something went wrong.
Please, try again.
errors.failed:
Something went wrong.
Please, try again.
errors.invalid_url:
Something went wrong.
Please, try again.
errors.max_file_size_exceeded:
One or more assets exceed the allowed limit ({maxFileSizeInMb}MB).
Optimize or remove large files and try again.
errors.unknown:
Something went wrong.
Please, try again.
errors.invalid_creator_wallet: Creator must be a valid Ethereum wallet address.

redirect.sign_in: You will be redirected to Sign In step in {seconds} seconds...

success.url: The URL to jump in your {target} is:
success.in_progress: You can now access your scene even while it's still processing.

deployment_history.title: Deployment History
deployment_history.no_deployments: No deployment history available for this project.

errors.invalid_path: Folder doesn't exist or can't save files there. Please choose a different folder.

options.notify: Notify me of new version updates

errors.invalid_app_extension: Invalid application selected. Please select a valid .app bundle
errors.invalid_exe_file: Invalid application selected. Please select a valid .exe file

app_warnings.label: App Warnings
app_warnings.show_warnings: Show a warning message each time you preview or publish a scene that contains custom code

version.up_to_date: Creator Hub is up to date.
version.label: Version: {version}

update.auto_restart: Creator Hub will auto-restart after the update.
update.error:
We couldn't check for updates.
Please try again later.
update.timeout:
Update check timed out.
Please check your connection and try again.

access.title: Manage who can access your World
access.description: Manage who can access your World by toggling between "Private" and "Public".
access.subtitle: In Private mode, you can grant access to a max of 100 addresses (Decentraland users). Please note, if you revert to Public mode, your list of approved addresses will be erased.

type.invitation_only_description: Only addresses and communities included in the whitelist can join.
type.password_protected_description: Only users who know the access password can join

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: If you revert to Public mode, your list of approved addresses will be erased.

access.empty_list: You haven't approved any addresses yet
access.csv_drop_text: Drop your CSV file here or

password.empty_state: The password for this world is not defined.

dialog.info: Make sure to write down your password so you don't lose it!

error.too_short: Password must be at least {min} characters

collaborators.description: Add up to 10 addresses (Decentraland users) as collaborators and manage their permissions to deploy or stream into your World.
collaborators.empty_list: You haven't added any collaborators/addresses yet
collaborators.column_stream_tooltip: User will be able to stream content into your World
collaborators.column_deploy_tooltip: User will be able to deploy new scenes to your World

parcels.title: Custom Coordinates
parcels.description: Click individual tiles to include/exclude them in the layout.

content.title: Secure sign-in step
content.body:
Remember the verification number below.

You'll be prompted to confirm it in your web browser to securely link your sign in.
content.verification_code_info: Keep this number private. It ensures that your sign-in is secure and unique to you.
content.expiration: Verification number will expire in {minutes}:{seconds} minutes

errors.max_attempts: Maximum signin attempts reached. Please try again later.
